# Refile::MiniMagick

TODO: Write a gem description

## Installation

Add this line to your application's Gemfile:

```ruby
gem 'refile-mini_magick'
```

And then execute:

    $ bundle

Or install it yourself as:

    $ gem install refile-mini_magick
